name: PragmaticTalkAVoiceMarketingFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Pragmatic talk is brought to you by the husband and wife team behind Pragmatic Digital. Listen as Susan and Scot share bite-sized episodes on how you can add Voice into your Marketing plans and become more customer centric.

This flash briefing was created and is hosted by Witlingo. If you would like your own flash briefing, please email contact@witlingo.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
